title: Interpretation of seeing the number 72 in a dream

preview.html: The meaning for a person also indicates sustenance and new work for him in life, and the dream differs in its interpretation from that of a young man in the presence of goodness that he sees in his life, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the number 72 in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried woman saw in a dream that she was writing the number 72 in the dream and waiting for it to happen. Something important in her life. This is an indication that this matter is about to appear, God willing. And if a single girl sees in a dream that she is looking at the number 72 in the dream and she is in a very good condition. The following is an indication of her success in an important cause that she has been fighting for for a long time. And if the woman is exposed If an unmarried woman has some psychological pressures in her life, her vision will reach 72. This is a sign of her relief from these psychological pressures at this time in her life. If an unmarried woman sees the number 72 in a dream with her house number and she is happy with it. Here it indicates very important people in this woman’s life. The single woman they will find during this period. It also explains that the dreamer sees writing many numbers, including the number 72. It indicates the abundant sustenance that she will obtain in her life, God willing. See also: Interpretation of seeing the number 70 in a dream and what the number 70 indicates. Interpretation of seeing the number 72 In a dream for a married woman: The married woman who sees the number 72 in her dream was going through a period full of crises. It is an indication that he will get rid of all the crises he is going through at this time, God willing. It also indicates that a married woman writing the number 72 in a dream brings a lot of goodness. And the livelihood that will come to this married woman after a long struggle in her life. As for the married woman who looks at the number 72 in a dream and rejoices in it. This is an indication that there is a remedy for all the problems and worries in which she lives, God Almighty willing. It also explains that the married woman is looking for the number 72. In a dream and she does not find it. It is an indication of a major problem that will occur in her life during this period. It also shows that the married woman’s attempt to draw the number 72 was not good. It indicates the unfavorable marital life that she is living during this time. Interpretation of seeing the number 72 in a dream for a divorced woman and a vision A divorced woman in a dream writes the number 72 in a dream and it looks very bad. She explains that there are problems in her life and she will live with them for a while. Seeing the number 72 in a dream means that she has gotten rid of some crises that she is going through in her life. She will live comfortably for a long time. Likewise, a divorced woman who sees her husband giving her the sum of 72 in a dream. It indicates the abundance of money and support that this divorced woman will receive in life. It also indicates that seeing 72 in a dream is a sign of goodness and great living that will come to the dreamer. But he is a little tired and miserable now. And the divorced woman who searches for the number 72 in her dream and does not find it in many places. It shows that there are no good things in which she will live. But he will succeed in getting rid of them this time. Read also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the number 71 in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 72 in a dream. title: How can I remove chlorine from clothes without damaging them?

preview.html: How to remove chlorine from clothes without damaging them. When chlorine comes into contact with colored clothes, it causes the color to fade and fade. It also damages the fabrics and makes them more susceptible to tearing and wear. But they can cause damage to the things used to clean them, so in this article we will learn together how to remove chlorine from clothes without damaging them. How do I remove chlorine from clothes? Our clothes are our way of expression and human appearance requires a lot of care and attention. Therefore, women are always looking for new ways to preserve their clothes and the clothes of their families. Chlorine is one of the basic materials that we cannot do without, especially with white clothes, but the problem lies in accidents that sometimes happen and we find that chlorine has left stains on colored clothes. Since these Accidents can happen to any of us. We have collected all the information about ways to remove chlorine stains from clothes. The white vinegar method for removing chlorine stains from clothes. White vinegar can be used to get rid of chlorine stains on clothes by following these steps: Clothes must be washed quickly after chlorine falls on them in the water. Cold to prevent it from leaking onto it. After soaking the garment in water, you must bring a white cloth and dip it in vinegar. Make sure the cloth is clean first and then place it on the chlorine stain on the clothing. Place a cloth dampened with vinegar on the stain and move it with pressing movements. Make sure it does not come into contact with the vinegar. Sodium thiosulfate is used to solve staining problems caused by chlorine by: Bring a liter of clean water and add a spoonful of sodium thiosulfate to it. Stir until it mixes well with the water. Place the stain on your clothes in this solution. Quickly start rubbing the stain with your hands. Wash the clothes quickly to quickly get rid of traces of the chemicals in them. If chlorine stains cannot be removed from the clothes, color remover can be used on the stain to get rid of it. Avoid contact with eyes and skin after Use sodium thiosulfate because it causes eye and skin irritation and may also lead to respiratory tract irritation. Clothes Crayon Method From the name it sounds like child's play, but it is actually one of the useful solutions to the problems of chlorine stains on clothes. All you have to do is: Go to a tissue and detergent store and buy the color that matches the clothes. You can use more than one color to compare to find the color closest to your clothes. Then color the stain so that it looks similar to the rest of the fabric. Clothes should be taken care of and not washed with chlorine. It is preferable to wash Hands, especially for delicate clothes. You should follow the washing instructions on the clothing label. How to Dye ClothesIf you are unable to solve the problem of chlorine stains with the previously mentioned methods, you can follow the method of dyeing clothes. It is better to dye the entire garment, not just the chlorine stain, to ensure that you get Good results. Buy some type of dye and then follow the instructions on the page

title: Interpretation of Zamzam water in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing Zamzam water in a dream is definitely a sign of the great good that the dreamer will receive in reality. It is one of the things about which the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: “He is blessed. Food tastes good and cures illness.” Hence we find that it is always associated in the mind with healing, answering prayers, as well as visiting the Holy House of God. What does it mean in a dream, and this is what we will learn through our next article in the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of Zamzam water in a dream Zamzam water in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing Zamzam water in a dream as evidence of the abundance of goodness, happiness, and contentment with which the dreamer lives, God willing. It also foretells that the dreamer will achieve all the desires and aspirations he wanted in reality. Seeing Zamzam water indicates the end of the worries and problems that the dreamer suffered from and the enjoyment of tranquility and peace of mind, God willing. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing Zamzam water in a dream is sometimes a sign of the great status that he will reach. To the dreamer, because he has great knowledge and understanding. Drinking Zamzam water is evidence of his generosity. Zamzam water in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation agrees with what Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretation of seeing a person drinking Zamzam water in a dream, and he says that the dreamer always attains great good. , whether in livelihood or money as well. As health, or even an answer to prayer. It is one of the dreams promising to reach all the ambitions and aspirations that the dreamer wanted to achieve in reality. The explosion of the Zamzam well, or the muddy water in it, does not bode well at all, as it is evidence of exposure to many problems in life, One must be very careful and face it calmly. If it appears that water is coming out of more than one well in a dream, this is a sign of the many worries and pains that will accumulate on him, and he must seek help from God Almighty to get rid of them. Interpretation of drinking Zamzam water in a dream For a single woman: An unmarried woman seeing Zamzam water in a dream is interpreted as one of the dreams that indicates her practical and scientific success, as it is good news for her that she will be able to achieve all the dreams she wanted in the past. In some cases, the unmarried woman who sees Zamzam water in a dream is A sign that she is a very pious girl who fears God Almighty and follows His path. Interpretation of a dream about drinking Zamzam water for a married woman: A dream about Zamzam water for a married woman is no different from a dream for an unmarried woman, as in general it is a sign of goodness and justice and the removal of worries and problems, God willing. If the dreamer finds herself drinking Zamzam water in a dream, carrying it is considered a sign of the happiness and goodness that you will obtain in life, and it can be good news for the success and righteousness of your children and the piety of their hearts. If a married woman is waiting for pregnancy, then her dream is evidence that God Almighty will respond to her prayers and that she will become pregnant in the near future, along with enjoying health and well-being from God. Interpretation of seeing Zamzam Well in a dream: If the fortuneteller finds that Zamzam Well is almost without water, then this is a dream.

title: Interpretation of testing in a dream

preview.html: We offer you the interpretation of testing in a dream, which is one of the most mysterious and interesting dreams. This type of dream often comes to us when the exam period approaches, as an expression of anxiety and tension that haunts the dreamer for fear of the difficulty of the subject and expectations of his inability to pass the exam. But the dream becomes more strange when we have this dream in the event of completing all educational stages. Does this dream express something annoying and bad for the dreamer, or does it carry a good message for him? We will learn the answer to this question through an encyclopedia where you can learn about the interpretation of the test in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the test in a dreamInterpretation of the dream of the test in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing an examination paper in general indicates the experience of the world, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a human being In a dream, while he is taking an exam but is unable to pass it, this indicates a lack of obedience to God in reality and the need to draw closer to Him. If a person sees in his dream that he is in front of an exam paper, but he is unable to answer the questions, then this vision symbolizes the appearance of something unpleasant For those who have the vision, God knows best. Seeing the visionary succeeding in exams shows his determination and ability to face difficulties in reality. Seeing a black test paper indicates difficult problems that the person with the vision faces in reality. If a man sees in a dream that he is on an exam board and sees his teacher, then This vision indicates his success and superiority in reality. Interpretation of seeing an exam in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing success in a dream indicates the ability to overcome crises and difficulties that the dreamer faces in reality. Seeing him refusing to take an exam shows that he will lose many opportunities in his life. Seeing him being late for exams indicates On the dreamer’s heart and his tension in reality. If a man sees in a dream that he cannot pass an exam, then this dream symbolizes his inability to achieve goals in reality. What is the interpretation of an exam in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a test paper in which she could not Answering the questions, this vision symbolizes the delay of her marriage in reality, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried woman passing the test in a dream means that she will get married soon, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman dreams that she failed the test, then this vision symbolizes her success in reality. Interpretation of seeing a test in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is in front of a test paper and cannot answer the questions, then this vision indicates that she will be exposed to family problems or a financial crisis. Seeing success in a married woman’s dream bodes well and that she will become pregnant soon. And God knows best. Seeing failure in a married woman’s dream indicates goodness and stability in her married life. Interpretation of a test in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is in front of a test paper and cannot answer the questions, then this vision indicates the difficulty of giving birth. Seeing a pregnant woman passing Testing indicates that it is

title: Interpretation of the evening prayer in a dream

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of the afternoon prayer in a dream and its meaning in different situations. Prayer, in fact, is one of the pillars of religion, one of the five most important pillars of Islam, and a means of bringing people closer together. To God Almighty, and seeing in his dream that he is praying indicates goodness because it is linked to obedience to God Almighty. But in particular, the Isha prayer has many different interpretations depending on the situation, which we will examine for you in this article with knowledge of the sayings of interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin in interpreting the dream of the Isha prayer.Interpretation of the Isha prayer in a dreamInterpretation of the dream of Isha prayer in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin narrated that Seeing the afternoon prayer in a dream is a sign of goodness, livelihood and abundance. If a man sees in a dream that he is praying the evening prayer in the Sacred Mosque, then this vision indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals in reality. If the dreamer sees that he prayed the evening prayer over a dead person in a dream, then this vision shows the situation Good news for the dreamer and his condition changed for the better. If we see the evening prayer on the mountain, this vision indicates victory over enemies in reality. Ibn Sirin also went on to interpret this dream that in the case of a vision of praying on the Kaaba, this vision indicates that the dreamer has committed a lot. Of sins and his disobedience to reality. Seeing the evening prayer in the Kaaba indicates that the person with insight has a high status, and it also indicates that he will obtain a high position at work. Interpretation of the evening prayer in a dream for a single woman: Seeing the evening prayer in an unmarried woman’s dream is good for her and indicates The date of marriage is approaching, and God knows best. In the case of a single woman who sees herself praying the evening prayer in church, this vision indicates success and prosperity, in various aspects of her life. Seeing an unmarried woman kneeling in a dream indicates her relationship with a man she loves in reality. Vision An unmarried woman in a dream that she is praying the evening prayer in the bathroom is one of the hated dreams that indicate that she has committed transgressions and misdeeds, and it is a message to her about the necessity of repenting to God. Among the symbols of the evening prayer in a dream is that it indicates psychological stability and good circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about the evening prayer for a married woman: A married woman has many connotations for the evening prayer. Seeing the afternoon prayer in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates her good condition and the stability of her married life. If a married woman sees that she is praying in the wrong direction, this vision is one of the hateful dreams that indicates a major problem for her in reality, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is praying the evening prayer in a church, this vision indicates an abundance of food. Interpretation of the evening prayer in a dream about a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband is leading her to the evening prayer, then this dream is evidence of her husband’s love for her in reality. And in the event that she sees The pregnant woman herself prays the afternoon prayer on time. This vision is a sign of nourishment and she is giving birth to a baby girl, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman kneeling during the evening prayer in a dream means that worries and sorrows will stop in reality. In the event that she sees

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the name Tahira in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing the name Tahira in a dream. Seeing the name Tahira in a dream is considered one of the dreams in which the interpretation is limited to the purity that belongs to the person who has the vision. The vision is good for its owner in a state that indicates goodness in all the details and events that occurred in it, and the time when the vision has a lot to know its purpose. , where every time there is a specific indicator that comes to explain and interpret the vision. Seeing the name Pure for a woman came as a possession of piety, justice, and chastity, and for the man for the good that comes to him. Interpretation of seeing the name Pure in a dream The interpretation of seeing the name Pure in a dream carries a group of interpretations and interpretations that came from interpreters, as the interpretation depends greatly on the details and events That occurred in the vision and this helps to achieve the correct interpretation of the vision, and the interpretation of seeing the name of a pure woman in a dream is as follows: If a man sees in a dream the name of a pure woman, this indicates a pure and transparent woman. title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing children in a dream

preview.html: Children in a dream: A person feels happy if he sees many beautiful young children in his sleep, and he believes that the interpretation is a good sign and expresses great happiness for him because children have been given to us by God Almighty, and jurists indicate many interpretations related to them. Seeing children, if they have a distinctive and beautiful shape, then the dream portends good, while in some other cases the interpretation is not good, and we highlight during our topic the meaning of children in the dream. Boys in a dream The interpretation of a dream about boys is full of expressive and beautiful meanings, especially if you see children who are girls, It is good news for you that your work will fall very soon, an increase in your financial livelihood, and the establishment of a business that you dream of and profits that you expect from it, so you will not suffer at all from failure and despair in it. If you see many young boys in your dream and they have a cheerful look and their laughter and smiles are loud, then the interpretation of Dreaming that you are getting married if you are single and there are happy things that you will see soon, circumstances and life will change for the better if it is sad and you tend to change any mistakes you make or wrong actions that have led to harm to you. Boys in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin tends to interpret a dream about children as a sign of joy Year and blessing in the dreamer’s life. Ibn Sirin does not see goodness in the cries of children during a dream and says that the appearance of children crying loudly is a warning sign that the person should not face obstacles and advises the person not to give in to the obstacles that he will face yet. His dream, so he must be very patient and try to stay in a good position as much as possible until the crises and difficulties pass. Your dream you will find its interpretation in seconds on the secret dream interpretation site from Google. Boys in a dream about NabulsiImam Nabulsi confirms the various symbols of seeing children in a dream and shows that seeing them is evidence of success Regarding the issue of pregnancy, with children appearing in a dream during adolescence, this indicates the entry of luck into a person’s reality in the shortest time and the improvement of his work situation, and thus he becomes in good condition and God Almighty gives him a lot of money and what is permissible, but if one sees many children screaming, he should check. Most of his behavior and stays away from evil lest God punish him severely. Boys in a Single Dream Interpretation of a dream of single boys can confirm her exhaustion and thinking a lot about the matter, and most experts tell her about the emotional goodness and stability that she will find in it, as she can deal with someone who makes her very happy and desires that. And sometimes the meaning of the dream shows the happiness of living with someone who is already connected to her. Whenever the children appear in the vision well and beautiful, the meaning of the dream assures the girl that she will be filled with confidence in the person she will marry, in addition to quickly settling in her work situation. However, if she is witnessing a conflict in her work because of some, the fear and anxiety of losing her source of livelihood will disappear. title: What is the symbol of kohl in the dream of Ibn Sirin’s married wife?

preview.html: Kohl in a dream for a married woman. Kohl is a ground stone and its powder is used in kohl. It has many types, and women love to use it to beautify their eyes. When a woman sees kohl in a dream, it speeds up the search for different meanings and connotations of this dream. Make sure that it brings goodness and benefit, and this has happened. No, so we will explain in detail the different interpretations received by jurists in this regard. Kohl in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of a dream about kohl for a married woman has many implications, the most important of which are the following: If a woman sees kohl in a dream, this is a sign of the end of the difficulties and crises that she faces in her life. In addition to obtaining a distinguished position in the coming days, the dream also indicates the presence of goodness. The woman who helps her find a solution to a problem she is facing may be her mother, her grandmother, her aunt, or her uncle. A married woman’s dream of Cole also expresses the ample provision that God will provide her soon, such as obtaining a new home, buying land, or becoming pregnant and achieving a goal she was looking for. About him for a period of time. If a married woman sees that she is applying kohl on herself during her sleep, this is a sign of recovery and recovery if she suffers from a physical illness or the end of a problem that she is treating or feels happy and psychologically comfortable. After a period of distress and sadness. If a married woman dreams that she is getting eyeliner in her hands from a stranger, this means that she is stealing money. And when a married woman who has not yet given birth dreams of painting her eyes with eyeliner, this symbolizes the appearance of pregnancy, God willing. Asrar website for dream interpretation It is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: A website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Kohl in a dream by Ibn Sirin’s married wife. Learn about the most prominent interpretations received by the scholar Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - in interpreting a dream about kohl for a married woman: Seeing a cole in a married woman’s dream symbolizes her sound mind and her ability to think soundly and see things correctly. If a blind man puts a plug in his eyes in a dream, this means that God - Glory be to Him - will restore his sight, which rejoices his heart. If one dreams of wiping Someone uses eyeliner while he is sleeping to lose his sight. This is a sign that he has lost a lot of money due to deceiving the law or obtaining it illegally. Kohl in general in a dream indicates money, and the dreamer’s vision of the way he wears kohl means that he is a good person, but this interpretation does not apply. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is suffering from colic in her eyes, this is a sign of her great happiness because her newborn is approaching life and she is looking forward to it, as the dream indicates that labor. The process is over. Peacefully without feeling much fatigue or pain. Also, seeing cabbage in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the great sustenance and blessing that she will enjoy in the coming days, which may be her acquisition of any property. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing saliva in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: The interpretation of Ibn Shirin and Al-Nabulsi’s dream of seeing saliva, and seeing saliva in a dream indicates wealth and hearing good news, and dry mouth indicates poverty and difficulty in life. And the interpretation of saliva in a dream, the meaning of saliva in a dream for single, married and pregnant women, the connotations of saliva from the mouth, seeing a change in the color of saliva, A symbol of saliva accompanied by blood. It is rare to see it in a dream, but it carries many signs and meanings that we will learn from today when interpreting the vision of saliva based on the sayings of Imam Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about saliva by Ibn Sirin. A dream about cold saliva in a dream indicates a serious disease that is difficult to treat and may also indicate To death. Seeing dried saliva in the mouth in a dream is a sign of poverty, stress, sadness, lack of money, and hearing sad news. Seeing saliva foam in a dream means lying and distorting the image of others. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing spit in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about saliva according to Al-Nabulsi will indicate The interpretation of seeing someone drained in a dream refers to a brave, strong-willed man who is able to bear his responsibilities. Thus, the dream in which you see saliva accompanied by foam indicates that we are talking about lies, gossip, hypocrisy and distrust. Seeing green saliva in a dream is evidence of many differences and problems. Which is difficult for the dreamer to get out of. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mouth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about saliva for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing saliva in a dream for a single woman is a praiseworthy vision for her that indicates that she will get a lot of money. Therefore, seeing saliva On the street in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of helping others, cooperating with them, and doing good deeds. An unmarried woman’s dream of seeing drooling in your home indicates that she will achieve great success in her work and studies. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tongue in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-NabulsiInterpretation of a dream Saliva for a married woman. Thus, the dream of a husband facing the husband in a married woman’s dream indicates a great benefit from her husband that could be a gift. Seeing drooling inside the house in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she contributes to her family’s expenses and takes care of them. Seeing a married woman drooling in The dream is evidence of the tension in her relationship with her husband and that there are many disagreements and problems with him. Interpretation of seeing saliva for a pregnant woman This is how a dream about saliva flowing during sleep in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates giving birth in comfort and reassurance of her safety and the safety of her unborn child. Seeing a pregnant woman’s saliva is evidence that the fetus is healthy. Good and the safety of the mother and fetus and ease of birth. Interpretation of the saliva of the dead in a dream. Seeing the saliva of the dead indicates that the dreamer will obtain a benefit such as the inheritance that the dreamer will obtain. Seeing drooling of saliva indicates many good things for the pioneer and many benefits. Interpretation of a dream of swallowing saliva. Seeing yourself swallowing Games are not good and indicate anxiety and anxiety

title: Interpretation of a dream about dirt in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about dirt in a dream about Al-Asamit Interpretation of dreams: Soil appears in a dream in concerns and judgments, if it is loaded with storms. Eating dirt in a dream portends a lot of goodness and dreams come true. Soft dirt inside a dream indicates the prosperity of life. As for the dream of getting rid of dirt from clothes, it is evidence of a lack of kindness. And lack of money. Interpretation of a dream about dirt in one dream. Dirt in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates optimism and achieving goals. As for the dream of sweeping dirt in an unmarried girl’s dream, it is a sign of failure and disagreements with the fiancé. If she sees dirt on the clothes, this indicates that her marriage is approaching. Interpretation Dreaming of dirt in a dream for a married woman: A married woman who dreams that she has a lot of dirt in the house, this indicates kindness and abundance of sustenance without any fatigue. Cleaning the house of dirt in a married woman’s dream indicates heartbreak and marital discord. Interpretation of a dream of dirt for a pregnant woman. A dream about eating dirt in a dream refers to Feeding a male child. A pregnant woman walking on dirt is evidence of an easy birth. Wet dirt indicates many problems. If you see a dream of sweeping dirt, this indicates the health of the fetus. Interpretation of a dream of dirt for a man. If one sees in a dream that he is shaking off the dust from his clothes, this indicates Poverty that falls into it indicates a reckless dream. Dirt from the house is clear evidence of the separation of the wife and the difference between them. Dirt filled with water in a dream indicates fatigue. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital situation in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.
